Text: Has this torrent been scrubbed? Or is this a straight rip?

Thanks so much for seeding!
Cant find this anywhere XD

I got an error with this file:

I select all the files (except Readme.txt of course), then rightclick-> 7-Zip -> "Extract Here", then after a couple of seconds get the error: "....\[Wii]Harvest_Moon_Animal_Parade[USA]\wii-hmap.7z.001, Data error in 'wii-hmap.iso'. File is broken. This is with the 7-zip program. WinRAR won't even open it. Any ideas?

Downloaded 7zip ver.907 -> installed it -> right click on wii-hmap.7z.001 --> 7-zip -->extract to... and thats it, worked fine, thank you.

wont be able to try game until later today but atleast this far, worked fine :)

Thanks mabeman for clearing that up.

http://www.7-zip.org/
I just tried this and it worked perfectly! Thanks so much! You're the best!! xD

still not working :/ I downloaded it twice now hah... I never have had this problem before, it has worked fine on other split archives.. oh well, I'll wait for another version to come out, thanks mabeman & zero5100 ;)

got home now and tried the game from usb and disc, both gives me 002 error. Havent used my wii since june. Im not so aware with upgrading ios etc. done the doftmode once over year ago, all games has worked since now. Do i need to update something and what? my IOS is 249. havent updated wii soft, i think its 3.3 or 3.4 thanks. all old games works ok still
nevermind! for some odd reason it worked on my other computer with the same operating system... the only difference being that this one is 64 bit... o.O thanks guys!

thank you so much zero5100 ^^
you are the best :)

mabeman here use this :

Just using 002 fix didn't solve the problem but got it working when updated my ios249 rev 10 to rev 14 and then used loader with 002fix. Might be shit ios but with that all my games works (now including animal parade) :)  thanks to all
